title: Utah LGBT Anti-Discrimination Bill Includes Religious Exemptions
teaser: The governor of Utah is expected to sign an anti-discrimination bill into law Thursday that protects LGBT residents from housing and employment discrimination.
contentencoded:
The governor of Utah is expected to sign a bill into law Thursday that protects LGBT residents from housing and employment discrimination. It also includes exemptions for religious groups.
